excerpt: "Meta, the parent company of Facebook, plans to release data which could help cevelop cheaper hydregn fuel. The data set, developed in collaboration with Carnegie Mellon University, could provide important input to artificial intelligence (AI) research looking for cheaper chemical catalysts for a critical chemical reaction used in hydrogen fuel production."
